title: I AM ATHLETE | REGGIE BUSH: “Give Me My Heisman back.”
description:
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE?sub_confirmation=1
WATCH MORE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE

I AM ATHLETE | SEASON 3 - Episode 52
Reggie Bush joins Brandon Marshall, Adam "Pacman" Jones, and LeSean "Shady" McCoy and in episode 52 of I Am Athlete. Reggie opens up about the depression he battled early in his NFL career because of the NCAA probe he and the USC Trojans faced because of claims he and his family profited from his collegiate career. Bush hopes a recent multi-million settlement the NCAA paid to his former position coach will help clear his name, and potentially lead to the Heisman Trophy taken away from him being returned. 

⭐️We're going on a LIVE TOUR! ⭐️
Get your tickets here ➡️ https://iamathletetv.com/IAATour
See y'all there!!!
